mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSTING (POSTING_NO, MEM_NO, CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_NAME, END_TIME, START_TIME, START_PRICE, BID_UNIT, STATUS) VALUES (PNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{productInfo}, #{productName}, TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), SYSDATE, #{startPrice}, #{bidUnit}, 'BID')
mapper.select: SELECT POSTING_NO, MEM_NO, CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_NAME, END_TIME, START_TIME, START_PRICE, BID_UNIT, STATUS FROM POSTING WHERE POSTING_NO = #{postingNo} AND STATUS = 'BID'

SELECT POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(MAX(BID_PRICE), START_PRICE) AS MAX_PRICE, COUNT(BID_NO) AS BID_COUNT, END_TIME, IMG_FILE FROM POSTING LEFT JOIN BID USING (POSTING_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING (POSTING_NO) WHERE IMG_NO = 1 GROUP BY POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, END_TIME, IMG_FILE, IMG_NO, START_TIME, START_PRICE ORDER BY START_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, MAX_PRICE, BID_COUNT, END_TIME, IMG_FILE FROM ( SELECT POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(MAX(BID_PRICE), START_PRICE) AS MAX_PRICE, COUNT(BID_NO) AS BID_COUNT, END_TIME, IMG_FILE FROM POSTING LEFT JOIN BID USING (POSTING_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING (POSTING_NO) WHERE IMG_NO = 1 GROUP BY POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, END_TIME, IMG_FILE, IMG_NO, START_TIME, START_PRICE ORDER BY BID_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4 )

SELECT POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(MAX(BID_PRICE), START_PRICE) AS MAX_PRICE, COUNT(BID_NO) AS BID_COUNT, END_TIME, IMG_FILE FROM POSTING LEFT JOIN BID USING (POSTING_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING (POSTING_NO) WHERE IMG_NO = 1 AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' GROUP BY POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, END_TIME, IMG_FILE, IMG_NO, START_TIME, START_PRICE ORDER BY START_TIME DESC

SELECT POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(MAX(BID_PRICE), START_PRICE) AS MAX_PRICE, COUNT(BID_NO) AS BID_COUNT, END_TIME, IMG_FILE FROM POSTING p LEFT JOIN BID USING (POSTING_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING (POSTING_NO) WHERE IMG_NO = 1 AND p.MEM_NO = #{memNo} GROUP BY POSTING_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, END_TIME, IMG_FILE, IMG_NO, START_TIME, START_PRICE HAVING COUNT(BID_NO) > 0 OR MAX(BID_PRICE) IS NULL ORDER BY START_TIME DESC
